club.title: The Club
club.intro: More than a club, we are a family. For over a decade, we've been dedicated to nurturing young athletes in Bournazel, teaching the beautiful game through passion, discipline, and respect.

2014.title: Foundation
2014.desc: Olympique Bournazel CFA was established with a vision to develop youth football

2016.title: First Championship
2016.desc: Our U12 team won their first regional championship

2019.title: Expansion
2019.desc: Opened new training facilities and expanded to 5 age categories

2024.title: 10 Years Strong
2024.desc: Celebrating a decade of excellence and over 200 trained athletes

passion.title: Passion
passion.desc: We instill love for the game

discipline.title: Discipline
discipline.desc: Building character on and off the field

respect.title: Respect
respect.desc: For teammates, opponents, and the sport

registration.title: Registration 2024-2025
registration.subtitle: Join our football family and start your journey to excellence

u11.title: U11 - Youth (Born 2014-2015)
u11.schedule: Training: Monday, Wednesday & Friday, 4:00 PM - 5:30 PM

u13.title: U13 - Pre-Teens (Born 2012-2013)
u13.schedule: Training: Monday, Wednesday & Friday, 5:30 PM - 7:00 PM

u15.title: U15 - Cadets (Born 2010-2011)
u15.schedule: Training: Tuesday, Thursday & Saturday, 5:30 PM - 7:00 PM

clubInfo.tagline: Forging future talents and building character through the beautiful game.
